text.section:
The court may compel compliance with the Commission's order:
by issuing an order to cease and desist from the violation; or
by granting other injunctive relief.

section.section:
The court may not void an official act that:
appropriates public funds;
levies a tax; or
provides for the issuance of a bond, note, or other evidence of public obligation.

text.section: After hearing the case, the court may grant all or part of the relief sought.
